Title: Menu
Description: Welcome to our family-run Indian restaurant, where every dish tells a story of tradition and love. Our recipes have been passed down through generations, each one crafted with care using the freshest ingredients and authentic spices. Come taste the flavors of our heritage!

Offers.Name: Steamed Rice
Offers.Item Description: Our steamed basmati rice is the perfect canvas for any curry. We use premium, aged basmati that fills the restaurant with a heavenly aroma as it cooks. Simple, yet essential - just as our grandmother always said!

Offers.Name: Garlic Naan
Offers.Item Description: Our garlic naan is a family favorite, hand-stretched and baked in our traditional tandoor. We brush it with melted ghee and sprinkle it with fresh garlic and coriander. It's irresistible!

Offers.Name: Gulaab Jamun (2 pcs)
Offers.Item Description: These sweet treats are made with love using our great-grandmother's recipe. Soft milk dough balls are fried golden and soaked in a fragrant rose syrup. The perfect end to any meal!

Offers.Name: Chicken Curry
Offers.Item Description: Our chicken curry is a house specialty, cooked just the way our mother taught us. Tender chicken simmered in a rich gravy of onions, tomatoes, and our secret spice blend. It's a hug in a bowl!

Offers.Name: Malai Kofta
Offers.Item Description: A vegetarian delight that even meat-lovers can't resist! Soft cheese dumplings in a velvety, cashew-based sauce. It's our aunt's special recipe, perfected over decades.

Offers.Name: Peas Pulao Rice
Offers.Item Description: This aromatic rice dish is a family favorite. Basmati rice cooked with sweet green peas and whole spices. It's simple, but oh so delicious!

Offers.Name: Okra Masala
Offers.Flavour Profile: Tangy, spicy, and full of flavor
Offers.Item Description: Fresh okra, hand-picked and cooked to perfection with onions, tomatoes, and our blend of spices. It's a taste of our childhood summers!

Offers.Name: Vegetable Korma
Offers.Item Description: A medley of fresh vegetables in a rich, creamy cashew sauce. Garnished with dried fruits, it's a celebration of flavors in every bite!

Appetizers.Name: Vegetable Samosa
Appetizers.Item Description: Crispy pastry pockets filled with spiced potatoes and peas. Made fresh daily using our great-grandmother's recipe. It's the perfect start to any meal!

Appetizers.Name: Chicken Momo
Appetizers.Item Description: These Nepali-inspired dumplings are filled with juicy minced chicken, fresh herbs, and spices. Served with our special homemade achar. A family favorite!

Appetizers.Name: Vegetable Pakora
Appetizers.Item Description: A mix of fresh vegetables in a crispy chickpea batter. Our rainy day special, perfect with a cup of chai!

Appetizers.Name: Vegetable Chowmein
Appetizers.Item Description: Our take on the Indo-Chinese classic. Stir-fried noodles loaded with fresh, crunchy vegetables. A crowd-pleaser for all ages!

Appetizers.Name: Chaat Papri
Appetizers.Item Description: A delightful mix of crispy wafers, chickpeas, and potatoes, drizzled with yogurt and tangy chutneys. It's like a party in your mouth!

Appetizers.Name: Samosa Chat
Appetizers.Item Description: Our crispy samosas, lovingly crushed and topped with chickpeas, yogurt, and a medley of chutneys. A street food favorite, elevated!

Appetizers.Name: Onion Bhajia
Appetizers.Item Description: Crispy fritters made with sliced onions in a spiced chickpea batter. Our grandfather's recipe, perfect for a rainy evening!

Appetizers.Name: Mixed Veggie Platter
Appetizers.Item Description: Can't decide? Try our mixed platter! A little bit of everything - samosas, pakoras, and bhajias. It's like a tour of our family's favorite snacks!

Appetizers.Name: Fish Pakora
Appetizers.Item Description: Tender fish fillets in a light, crispy batter. Served with our homemade mint chutney. A coastal-inspired delight!

Appetizers.Name: Chili Chicken Momo
Appetizers.Item Description: Our chicken momos, tossed in a fiery Hakka-style sauce. A fusion of Nepali and Chinese flavors that packs a punch!

Appetizers.Name: Chicken Pakora
Appetizers.Item Description: Tender pieces of chicken, marinated in spices and fried to golden perfection. A family favorite that disappears fast!

Appetizers.Name: Chili Vegan Momo
Appetizers.Flavour Profile: Spicy, savory, with a hint of sweetness
Appetizers.Item Description: Our vegan take on the popular chili momo. Packed with vegetables and tossed in our special Hakka-style sauce. Spicy and satisfying!

Appetizers.Name: Paneer Pakora
Appetizers.Flavour Profile: Crispy outside, soft and cheesy inside
Appetizers.Item Description: Cubes of our homemade paneer, dipped in spiced batter and fried golden. Served with tangy tamarind chutney. Simply irresistible!

Soups and Salads.Name: Cream of Tomato
Soups and Salads.Item Description: Our take on the classic tomato soup. Made with ripe tomatoes and a touch of cream. It's like a warm hug in a bowl!

Soups and Salads.Name: Mulligatawny
Soups and Salads.Item Description: A traditional Anglo-Indian soup with lentils, vegetables, and a blend of spices. It's comfort food with a spicy kick!

Soups and Salads.Name: Garden Salad
Soups and Salads.Item Description: A refreshing mix of crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cool cucumbers, and onions. Dressed with a squeeze of lemon for that perfect zing!

Soups and Salads.Name: Kuchumber Salad
Soups and Salads.Item Description: Our family's favorite summer salad. Diced tomatoes, cucumbers, and onions tossed with lime and our special chaat masala. Simple, yet bursting with flavor!

Tandoori Items.Name: Tandoori Chicken
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Our signature dish! Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then roasted in our clay oven. The recipe has been in our family for generations!

Tandoori Items.Name: Tandoori Mixed Chicken Platter
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Can't decide? Try our mixed platter! A delicious assortment of murgh malai tikka, hariyali tikka, and classic chicken tikka. It's a tandoor lover's dream!

Tandoori Items.Name: Paneer Tikka
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Cubes of our homemade paneer, marinated in yogurt and spices, then grilled to perfection in the tandoor. A vegetarian delight!

Tandoori Items.Name: Chicken Tikka (8 pcs)
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Succulent pieces of chicken breast, marinated overnight in our special blend of yogurt and spices. Grilled in the tandoor for that perfect char!

Tandoori Items.Name: Tandoori Fish Tikka (8 pcs)
Tandoori Items.Flavour Profile: Smoky, tangy, with a hint of turmeric
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Fresh fish marinated in a blend of yogurt, turmeric, and aromatic spices. Grilled to flaky perfection in our tandoor. A coastal favorite!

Tandoori Items.Name: Chicken Hariyali Tikka (8 pcs)
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Chicken breast pieces marinated in a vibrant green paste of mint, coriander, and spices. It's like a burst of freshness from our family garden!

Tandoori Items.Name: Murgh Malai Tikka (8 pcs)
Tandoori Items.Flavour Profile: Creamy, subtly spiced, with a hint of cardamom
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Tender chicken pieces marinated in a creamy blend of yogurt, cheese, and mild spices. It's our take on a Mughlai classic, perfect for those who prefer milder flavors.

Tandoori Items.Name: Chicken Seekh Kebab
Tandoori Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, juicy, with a smoky char
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Minced chicken blended with herbs and spices, shaped onto skewers and grilled in our tandoor. A recipe passed down from our grandfather, a kebab connoisseur!

Tandoori Items.Name: Reshmi Kebab
Tandoori Items.Flavour Profile: Silky, delicately spiced, with a hint of nuts
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Tender chicken supreme marinated in a creamy, nutty paste and gently spiced. Grilled to perfection, it lives up to its Name - 'silky' kebab!

Tandoori Items.Name: Lamb Seekh Kebab
Tandoori Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, spicy, with a smoky aroma
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Minced lamb mixed with our special blend of spices and herbs, shaped onto skewers and grilled in the tandoor. A favorite from our family's Eid celebrations!

Tandoori Items.Name: Tandoori Prawns
Tandoori Items.Flavour Profile: Smoky, tangy, with a hint of sweetness
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Juicy prawns marinated in a spicy yogurt blend and grilled to perfection. Inspired by coastal Indian cuisine, it's a taste of the sea from our tandoor!

Tandoori Items.Name: Lamb Chops (4 pcs)
Tandoori Items.Item Description: Succulent lamb chops marinated in our secret spice blend and grilled in the tandoor. It's a dish reserved for special occasions in our family!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Curry
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: Tender pieces of meat slow-cooked in a rich gravy of onions, tomatoes, and our family's secret spice blend. It's comfort food at its finest!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Vindaloo
Lamb and Goat.Flavour Profile: Fiery, tangy, with a hint of sweetness
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: A Goan-inspired dish featuring meat cooked in a spicy, tangy sauce with potatoes. Not for the faint-hearted, but a favorite among spice lovers!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Rogan Josh
Lamb and Goat.Flavour Profile: Aromatic, rich, with a hint of yogurt
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: A classic Kashmiri dish, featuring meat cooked in a rich sauce flavored with saffron and aromatic spices. It's like a warm, spicy hug!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Korma
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: Tender meat cooked in a rich, creamy sauce made with ground almonds and cashews. A Mughlai delicacy that's always a hit at family gatherings!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Madras
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: A South Indian specialty featuring meat cooked in a spicy coconut-based sauce. It's our family's tribute to the flavors of Chennai!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Saag
Lamb and Goat.Flavour Profile: Rich, earthy, with a balance of meat and greens
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: Tender meat cooked with fresh spinach and aromatic spices. It's our way of sneaking some greens into a delicious curry!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Kadhai
Lamb and Goat.Flavour Profile: Spicy, tangy, with bell pepper sweetness
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: Meat cooked with bell peppers and onions in a spicy tomato-based sauce. Named after the wok-like vessel it's traditionally cooked in!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Butter
Lamb and Goat.Flavour Profile: Rich, creamy, with a tomato-butter base
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: Our take on the classic butter chicken, but with lamb or goat! Tender meat in a luscious tomato-cream sauce. It's indulgence on a plate!

Lamb and Goat.Name: Lamb or Goat Masala
Lamb and Goat.Flavour Profile: Spicy, aromatic, with a thick gravy
Lamb and Goat.Item Description: Succulent meat cooked with a medley of spices, onions, and bell peppers. It's a celebration of flavors in every bite!

Fish Items.Name: Goan Fish Curry
Fish Items.Item Description: A coastal favorite! Basa fish cooked in a tangy coconut sauce, inspired by the sun-soaked beaches of Goa. It's like a vacation in a bowl!

Fish Items.Name: Fish Masala
Fish Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, tangy, with a rich gravy
Fish Items.Item Description: Tender basa fillets simmered in a flavorful masala sauce. Our family's twist on the classic curry, perfect for fish lovers!

Fish Items.Name: Prawn Masala
Fish Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, aromatic, with a hint of sweetness
Fish Items.Item Description: Succulent prawns cooked in a rich, spicy gravy. A recipe inspired by our grandmother's coastal hometown!

Fish Items.Name: Prawn Butter Masala
Fish Items.Flavour Profile: Creamy, slightly sweet, with a buttery finish
Fish Items.Item Description: Our twist on the classic butter masala! Juicy prawns in a velvety tomato-cream sauce. It's indulgence from the sea!

Fish Items.Name: Prawn Vindaloo
Fish Items.Flavour Profile: Fiery, tangy, with a vinegar kick
Fish Items.Item Description: A Goan specialty! Prawns cooked in a fiery, tangy sauce with potatoes. Not for the faint-hearted, but a must-try for spice enthusiasts!

Fish Items.Name: Prawn Madras
Fish Items.Item Description: Prawns simmered in a spicy, coconut-based sauce. Our homage to the vibrant flavors of South India!

Chicken Items.Name: Butter Chicken
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Creamy, slightly sweet, with a tomato-butter base
Chicken Items.Item Description: Our family's pride! Tender chicken in a velvety tomato-cream sauce. It's a hug in a bowl, and our most requested recipe!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Tikka Masala
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Tangy, spicy, with a rich gravy
Chicken Items.Item Description: Grilled chicken pieces simmered in a flavorful masala sauce. A British favorite with our own family twist!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Curry
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, aromatic, with a homestyle touch
Chicken Items.Item Description: Our home-style chicken curry, just like mom used to make! Tender chicken in a fragrant, spicy gravy. Pure comfort in every bite!

Chicken Items.Name: Chilli Chicken
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, tangy, with a soy sauce kick
Chicken Items.Item Description: An Indo-Chinese favorite! Crispy chicken tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce. It's our family's go-to for game nights!

Chicken Items.Name: Kadhai Chicken
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, tangy, with bell pepper sweetness
Chicken Items.Item Description: Chicken cooked with bell peppers and onions in a spicy tomato-based sauce. Named after the wok-like vessel it's cooked in!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Korma
Chicken Items.Item Description: A Mughlai delicacy! Chicken in a rich, creamy sauce made with ground almonds and cashews. It's always a hit at our family gatherings!

Chicken Items.Name: Madras Chicken
Chicken Items.Item Description: A South Indian specialty! Chicken cooked in a spicy coconut-based sauce. It's our family's tribute to the flavors of Chennai!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Vindaloo
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Fiery, tangy, with a vinegar kick
Chicken Items.Item Description: A Goan-inspired dish! Chicken cooked in a fiery, tangy sauce with potatoes. It's a favorite among our spice-loving customers!

Chicken Items.Name: Mango Chicken
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Sweet, tangy, with a hint of spice
Chicken Items.Item Description: Our summer special! Tender chicken in a sweet and tangy mango sauce. It's like sunshine on a plate!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Mushroom Bhuna
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, earthy, with a thick gravy
Chicken Items.Item Description: A hearty dish of chicken and mushrooms in a thick, flavorful gravy. It's our family's rainy day comfort food!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Saag
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, earthy, with a balance of chicken and greens
Chicken Items.Item Description: Tender chicken cooked with fresh spinach and aromatic spices. Our way of making sure you eat your greens!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Do Pyaza
Chicken Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, sweet, with prominent onion flavor
Chicken Items.Item Description: A classic dish where 'do pyaza' means double onions. Chicken cooked with lots of onions in a spicy, aromatic gravy. It's a family favorite!

Chicken Items.Name: Chicken Chettinad
Chicken Items.Item Description: A South Indian specialty! Chicken cooked in a spicy gravy with a unique blend of spices. It's our tribute to the rich Chettinad cuisine!

Rice and Biryani.Name: Steamed Rice
Rice and Biryani.Item Description: Perfectly steamed basmati rice. Simple, yet essential - the ideal companion to any curry!

Rice and Biryani.Name: Peas Pulao Rice
Rice and Biryani.Flavour Profile: Aromatic, with sweet pops of peas
Rice and Biryani.Item Description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with sweet green peas and whole spices. A colorful and tasty alternative to plain rice!

Rice and Biryani.Name: Vegetable Biryani
Rice and Biryani.Item Description: A vegetarian feast! Fragrant rice layered with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices, then slow-cooked to perfection. Our family's meat-free indulgence!

Rice and Biryani.Name: Chicken Biryani
Rice and Biryani.Flavour Profile: Aromatic, spicy, with juicy chicken pieces
Rice and Biryani.Item Description: Our signature biryani! Tender chicken and aromatic rice layered and slow-cooked with saffron and spices. It's a meal fit for royalty!

Rice and Biryani.Name: Goat Biryani
Rice and Biryani.Flavour Profile: Rich, aromatic, with tender goat meat
Rice and Biryani.Item Description: A special treat! Succulent pieces of goat meat layered with fragrant rice and slow-cooked to perfection. It's our go-to dish for celebrations!

Rice and Biryani.Name: Lamb Biryani
Rice and Biryani.Flavour Profile: Rich, aromatic, with tender lamb pieces
Rice and Biryani.Item Description: A royal feast! Tender lamb and aromatic rice slow-cooked with saffron and spices. It's a family recipe passed down through generations!

Rice and Biryani.Name: Prawn Biryani
Rice and Biryani.Flavour Profile: Aromatic, with a hint of the sea
Rice and Biryani.Item Description: A coastal delight! Succulent prawns layered with fragrant rice and slow-cooked with saffron and spices. It's like a seaside vacation in every bite!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Aloo Gobi
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, with earthy potato and cauliflower flavors
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: A classic combo of potatoes and cauliflower, saut√©ed with aromatic spices. It's our family's go-to veggie dish!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Bhindi Masala
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, tangy, with the unique flavor of okra
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Tender okra cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices. It's a dish that turns okra haters into okra lovers!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Malai Kofta
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, creamy, with a hint of sweetness
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Soft dumplings made from paneer and potatoes, served in a creamy tomato sauce. It's our vegetarian version of meatballs in sauce!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Mixed Vegetable
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, with a medley of vegetable flavors
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: A colorful mix of seasonal vegetables cooked in a flavorful gravy. It's like a garden on your plate!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Chana Masala
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, tangy, with earthy chickpea flavor
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Chickpeas simmered in a spicy tomato gravy with a blend of aromatic spices. It's our family's favorite protein-packed vegetarian dish!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Palak Paneer
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, creamy, with prominent spinach flavor
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Cubes of our homemade paneer cheese cooked in a creamy spinach sauce. It's our delicious way of eating greens!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Daal Makhani
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, creamy, with a buttery finish
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Black lentils slow-cooked to perfection with butter and cream. It's pure comfort in a bowl!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Daal Tarka
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Spicy, tangy, with a garlic punch
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Yellow lentils tempered with cumin, garlic, and spices. It's our family's everyday lentil dish, simple yet satisfying!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Mutter Paneer
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, creamy, with sweet pops of peas
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Our homemade paneer cheese and green peas in a creamy tomato sauce. It's a colorful and tasty vegetarian delight!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Shahi Paneer
Vegetarian Items.Flavour Profile: Rich, creamy, with a nutty sweetness
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Our homemade paneer in a rich, creamy sauce made with nuts and spices. It's a royal treat for cheese lovers!

Vegetarian Items.Name: Vegetable Korma
Vegetarian Items.Item Description: Mixed vegetables in a creamy cashew sauce, garnished with dried fruits. It's our vegetarian take on the Mughlai classic!

Breads.Name: Roti
Breads.Item Description: Whole wheat flatbread, baked fresh in our tandoor. It's the perfect tool for scooping up curry!

Breads.Name: Butter Roti
Breads.Flavour Profile: Whole wheat flavor with a buttery finish
Breads.Item Description: Our classic roti, brushed with melted butter for extra indulgence. Because everything's better with butter!

Breads.Name: Naan
Breads.Item Description: Soft, leavened flatbread baked in our tandoor. It's the classic curry companion!

Breads.Name: Butter Naan
Breads.Item Description: Our classic naan, brushed with melted butter. It's irresistibly soft and rich!

Breads.Name: Garlic Naan
Breads.Flavour Profile: Garlicky with a hint of coriander
Breads.Item Description: Naan bread topped with garlic and coriander. It's aromatic, flavorful, and slightly addictive!

Breads.Name: Laccha Paratha
Breads.Item Description: Multi-layered whole wheat bread, crispy and buttery. It's like a Indian croissant!

Breads.Name: Peshwari Naan
Breads.Item Description: Naan stuffed with a sweet mixture of coconut, raisins, and nuts. It's dessert in bread form!

Breads.Name: Aloo Paratha
Breads.Flavour Profile: Spicy potato filling in a crispy shell
Breads.Item Description: Whole wheat bread stuffed with spiced potatoes. It's a meal in itself!

Breads.Name: Cheese Naan
Breads.Item Description: Naan stuffed with melted cheese. It's our Indian version of cheese pizza!

Breads.Name: Kashmiri Naan
Breads.Item Description: Naan stuffed with a sweet mixture of nuts and raisins. A taste of Kashmir in every bite!

Breads.Name: Pudina Paratha
Breads.Item Description: Whole wheat bread stuffed with fresh mint. It's like a breath of fresh air for your taste buds!

Breads.Name: Gobhi Paratha
Breads.Flavour Profile: Spicy cauliflower filling in a crispy shell
Breads.Item Description: Whole wheat bread stuffed with spiced cauliflower. It's our sneaky way of making you eat your veggies!

Breads.Name: Chicken Keema Naan
Breads.Flavour Profile: Spicy minced chicken in a soft shell
Breads.Item Description: Naan stuffed with spiced minced chicken. It's a meal in itself and a favorite among our meat-loving customers!

Breads.Name: Onion Kulcha
Breads.Item Description: Soft bread stuffed with spiced onions. It's our family's favorite bread, perfect for soaking up curry!

Side Orders.Name: Plain Yogurt
Side Orders.Item Description: Our homemade yogurt, fresh and creamy. It's the perfect cooling accompaniment to spicy dishes!

Side Orders.Name: Raita
Side Orders.Flavour Profile: Cool and refreshing with crunchy vegetables
Side Orders.Item Description: Yogurt mixed with cucumbers and carrots. It's like a cool breeze for your taste buds after a spicy bite!

Side Orders.Name: Mixed Pickles
Side Orders.Item Description: A mix of vegetables pickled in oil and spices. It's a flavor bomb that adds a kick to any meal!

Side Orders.Name: Mango Chutney
Side Orders.Item Description: Sweet and tangy mango chutney. It's like sunshine in a bowl and pairs wonderfully with our savory dishes!

Desserts.Name: Ras Malai (2 pcs)
Desserts.Flavour Profile: Sweet and creamy with cardamom notes
Desserts.Item Description: Soft cheese patties soaked in creamy, cardamom-flavored milk. It's like eating a cloud of sweetness!

Desserts.Name: Rice Pudding
Desserts.Flavour Profile: Creamy and sweet with aromatic cardamom
Desserts.Item Description: Our grandmother's recipe! Slow-cooked rice pudding with milk, sugar, and cardamom. It's comfort in a bowl!

Desserts.Name: Gajar Halwa
Desserts.Flavour Profile: Sweet and nutty with a rich carrot flavor
Desserts.Item Description: A winter favorite! Carrots slow-cooked with milk, sugar, and nuts. It's like a warm hug for your taste buds!

Desserts.Name: Gulaab Jamun (2 pcs)
Desserts.Flavour Profile: Sweet and syrupy with a hint of rose
Desserts.Item Description: Soft milk dough balls, deep-fried and soaked in rose-flavored syrup. It's our family's celebration sweet!

Drinks.Name: Mango Lassi
Drinks.Flavour Profile: Sweet and tangy with rich mango flavor
Drinks.Item Description: A refreshing blend of yogurt and mango. It's like summer in a glass!

Drinks.Name: Sweet Lassi
Drinks.Item Description: A classic yogurt drink sweetened to perfection. It's our go-to refresher on a hot day!

Drinks.Name: Salted Lassi
Drinks.Item Description: A savory yogurt drink with a hint of salt and cumin. It's surprisingly refreshing and aids digestion!

Drinks.Name: Indian Masala Tea
Drinks.Flavour Profile: Warm and spicy with a creamy finish
Drinks.Item Description: Our special blend of black tea simmered with milk, sugar, and aromatic spices. It's a hug in a mug!

Drinks.Name: Coffee
Drinks.Item Description: Freshly brewed coffee to perk you up. Because sometimes you need a caffeine kick with your curry!

Drinks.Name: Soft Drinks
Drinks.Item Description: Your choice of popular Coca-Cola products. Sometimes you just need that fizzy sweetness!

Drinks.Name: Perrier
Drinks.Item Description: Sparkling natural mineral water. For when you want to feel fancy while dousing the spice!
